name: My Advanced Ai Project
description:
This is my university advanced ai project!  it's not a game really but more of a demo.  The goal of this project is to make an AI that uses a behaviour tree.  You can adjust how fast their food/water/toilet/sleep bars go up and down, turn on speakers the ai will turn off, and create messes around the house the ai will clean up!

The style of the game is based around a game myself and two other classmates made last year called OFFICESCAPE, you can find it here if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1678960/OFFICESCAPE/

I'm mostly posting this project so I can reference it and access it easily in the future, however, if you wish to play around with it I'd be more than happy to receive some feedback! also if you find any issues I'd really like to hear bout that ok thanks :)

Thanks for taking the time to visit this page!

-Erik
